column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////I had the pulled pork sandwich
column2: chocolate croissant and green tea matcha macaron. In my opinion
column4: but over priced. The croissant and macaron were absolutely delicious. Definitely one of the top macarons that I have tasted. However
column5: I would not recommend the dessert cup with the whipped cream and chocolate mousse. I had a taste of my friend's and it was overwhelmingly sweet and unpleasant-tasting despite the beautiful decor on the top.
